name: The Deerfather
description:
Go on a deer hunt in the ancient caves, and discover the dark knowledge of your forefathers

The Deerfather is a short action-adventure game where you take up the role of a stone age hunter, on a deer hunt that will take you to the depths of the caves. 

Throw spears, find ancient cave paintings and uncover the dark secrets below.

Controls

Arrow keys/WSAD - Move

Space - Interact/Throw spear

Esc - quit game

Report any bugs or glitches in the comments. Feedback is appreciated.
